original_text: I establish my covenant with you: Never again will all life be destroyed by the waters of a flood; never again will there be a flood to destroy the earth.”
korean_text: 내가 너희와 언약을 세우리니 다시는 모든 생물을 홍수로 멸하지 아니할 것이라 땅을 멸할 홍수가 다시 있지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: I establish my covenant with you:
Never again will all life be destroyed
by the waters of a flood;
never again will there be a flood
